title: Mass Pardons for January 6 Defendants
summary: ~1,500 people granted blanket clemency on Day 1 of second term. Included leaders of Oath Keepers and Proud Boys convicted of seditious conspiracy. Pardoned 600+ people convicted of assaulting law enforcement and 170 convicted of using deadly weapons. Removed restitution requirements costing victims estimated $1.3 billion. Some pardoned individuals later arrested for new violent crimes.
